attributes.action: Introduce a Proportional Voting system for the UK Government
attributes.additional_details: Some people say "Well, life isn't fair, so who cares if the voting system isn't". This is not the correct attitude.
attributes.background: I'm a 16 year old student of politics, and may be naive in what I am saying, but why a proportional voting system is not being used I don't know. We need to have a less Laisse Faire way of doing things and introduce this system ASAP. Preferably STV, as it is favoured by the Electoral Commitee.
